presentationTable.name: Facts - Lead Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Responses
presentationColumns.description: The total response activity for the campaign.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Lead Activities.# of Responses

presentationColumns.name: # of New Contacts
presentationColumns.description: The total new Contacts (New contact is the contact that is created as a result of Campaign response).
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Lead Activities.# of New Contacts

presentationColumns.name: # of New Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total new leads generated by the Campaign. (A lead is generated if a contact is newly acquired and responds to the campaign. Contacts are considered leads only once, so contacts are considered new leads only the first time they respond to a campaign. For subsequent responses, the contact is considered an existing lead).
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Marketing Campaign Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Eloqua Lead Activities.# of New Leads

presentationColumns.name: Average Responses
presentationColumns.description: The average number of campaign responses (Total Response/Campaign Count)
